original_text:
A thousand years in your sight
    are like a day that has just gone by,
    or like a watch in the night.
korean_text: 주의 목전에는 천 년이 지나간 어제 같으며 밤의 한 순간 같을 뿐임이니이다

sentences.original_text: A thousand years in your sight
are like a day that has just gone by,
or like a watch in the night.
